summary:
Islam is a religion that began in the 7th century CE with the teachings of Muhammad. He received divine revelations and called people to worship one God. Muhammad faced opposition in Mecca but gained followers in Medina. After his death, Islam spread quickly across the Arabian Peninsula and later throughout the world.

The history of Islam includes the formation of powerful empires, like the Umayyad and Abbasid caliphates, and important cultural developments during the Islamic Golden Age. However, it also faced challenges like Mongol invasions and European colonization. Today, Islam is one of the world's major religions, with over a billion followers.
title: History of Islam
